segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, and I can't help but feel a sense of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on getting those cookies that he doesn't realize how dangerous his position is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there, waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool's legs are splayed out, and it looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand is deep in the cookie jar, and he's holding a plate to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a slow-motion accident, unable to look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, adding to the sense of impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a peaceful garden, which makes the indoor scene even more absurd.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how quickly things can spiral out of control when no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
